hero.title: Welcome to Babakan Asem Village
hero.description: A green, friendly village full of mutual cooperation.

about.title: About Babakan Asem Village
about.desc1: Babakan Asem is a village located in a lush area where most residents are farmers and artisans. It has abundant natural potential, a strong culture of mutual cooperation, and various featured products managed by the Village-Owned Enterprise (BUMDes).
about.desc2: We are committed to building an independent, competitive, and prosperous village through local community empowerment.

profileVillage.title: Village Profile of Babakan Asem
profileVillage.description: Babakan Asem is a village rich in history, culture, and community potential. With the spirit of togetherness and mutual cooperation, this village continues to grow toward a better future, preserving traditional values while adapting to modern times.
profileVillage.historyText: According to its history, Babakan Asem Village was originally part of Bongkok Village and Conggeang Village. The name 'Babakan Asem' comes from a hamlet or 'babakan' where a large tamarind tree once stood. Babakan Asem is also an acronym for Bareng Bakti Negara Anu Sempurna. Meanwhile, the village motto is "Ayem Tengrtrem Kerta Raharja".
profileVillage.visionText: ‚ÄúTo realize Babakan Asem Village as an independent, advanced, and competitive village while maintaining cultural values and community cooperation.‚Äù
missionList: Improve community welfare through sustainable development.
Empower village potential to support the creative economy.
Enhance the quality of education & community health

achievements.description: Awarded for outstanding environmental initiatives and community participation in preserving green spaces.

achievements.title: Top 3 Digital Village Innovations ‚Äì West Java (2022)
achievements.description: Recognized for pioneering digital services in public administration and citizen engagement.

achievements.title: Active Village in Community Health Program (Posyandu) ‚Äì 2021
achievements.description: Acknowledged for consistent community involvement in local health initiatives and Posyandu activities.

Towards an Independent, Advanced & Prosperous Village
government.greetingMessage: ‚ÄúWe invite all residents of Babakan Asem Village to continue working together to build a more advanced, independent, and prosperous village. Active community participation is the key to the success of village development.‚Äù

villagePotential.title: Village Potentials of Babakan Asem
villagePotential.subtitle: Most residents work as farmers, livestock breeders, and gardeners producing high-quality natural food.
villagePotential.agricultureDesc: Rice, corn, cassava, peanuts, and vegetables are the village's mainstay.
villagePotential.livestockDesc: Cattle, goats, chickens & sheep for local consumption and boosting villagers' economy.
villagePotential.plantationDesc: Mangoes, bananas, and horticultural crops provide additional income for residents.
villagePotential.carouselTitle:
From fertile land and well-kept livestock,
we present quality food for your family
villagePotential.carouselSubtitle: Explore our village's top potential through the photo gallery below.
villagePotential.carousel1Desc: Vast fields yield rice, corn, cassava, and fresh vegetables.
villagePotential.carousel2Desc: Cows, goats, chickens, and sheep support village food security.
villagePotential.carousel3Desc: Plantations of mangoes, bananas, and horticulture increase community income.

pkk.title: Village Babakan Asem
pkk.subtitle: Empowering Families Towards Prosperous & Independent Villages
pkk.description: The PKK movement is a national initiative that grows from the community to build faithful, prosperous, and independent families through active participation of all village residents.
pkk.visionDesc: To realize faithful, prosperous, and independent families, with the values of mutual cooperation and active community participation.
missionList: Improve quality of life and family welfare
Encourage active participation in village development
Develop family creative economy through MSMEs
pkk.ctaTitle: Want to See PKK Gallery & Structure?
pkk.ctaDesc: See PKK activity documentation and full organizational structure that actively contributes to village development.

karangTaruna.vision: To become active, creative, and caring youth who contribute to village development.

hero.title: Village Consultative Body
hero.description: A village representative institution that collects community aspirations, oversees village governance, and ensures development transparency.

role.title: Main Roles & Duties of BPD
role.description: The Village Consultative Body (BPD) is the village government's partner in village administration. It functions as an institution that gathers and delivers community aspirations, discusses and approves village regulations, and monitors the performance of the village government.

tasks.1: Gather aspirations and needs of the village community.
tasks.3: Provide input in village budget and regulation planning.
tasks.4: Act as a bridge between the village government and the people.

guide.title: Village Administration Service Guide
guide.description: Below are the general steps to manage various letters and documents at Babakan Asem Village easily and quickly.
steps: Prepare the required documents according to the service type.
Visit the village office or use the online service.
Submit the documents and fill out the required form.
Wait for verification by the village staff.
Collect the completed letter or document.
guide.note: Note: Services are only available on weekdays (Monday - Friday) from 08.00 to 15.00 WIB. Please bring original and photocopy documents.

administrasi.title: Village Administration Services
administrasi.subtitle: Enjoy the convenience of faster and more practical village administration services. Submit letter requests or view population data easily.

onlineLetterService.title: Online Introductory Letter
onlineLetterService.desc: Create and submit introductory letter requests online. Fast, easy process that can be accessed anytime without needing to visit the village office.

populationInfoService.title: Population Infographics
populationInfoService.desc: View village population data and statistics in attractive and easy-to-understand infographics. Data is always updated in real-time.

administrasi.footerTip: Tips: Need help? Contact us or read the complete guide for more information

bansos.description: List of social assistance received by village residents.
bansos.analysis_text: The data shows a significant decrease in the number of social assistance recipients from 2020 to 2024. This <bold>39%</bold> decrease indicates improved community welfare and the effectiveness of poverty alleviation programs. The main contributing factors include:
bansos.what_is_text: Social Assistance (Bansos) is a government program to provide aid to those in need. This program aims to reduce the economic burden of poor and vulnerable communities.
